zip.not_found: Hm, we aren’t able to find that ZIP code. Please double check that you typed it correctly and try again.

shelter.closest:
Dakò! Men kèk abri nan zòn ou an: {{name}}.
Dirección: {{address}}, {{city}}  {{phone}}.
shelter.none_found: We couldn't find any open shelters close to you. Check http://irmaresponse.org for additional information or call 2-1-1 or 3-1-1.
shelter.automated_disclaimer: Bonjou, sa a se yon sèvis otomatik ki ka ede w jwenn yon abri ki disponib. Si sa a se yon ijans, pann leve, li rele 9-1-1. Ki kòd postal ou ye?
